metrom.title: What is Metrom?
metrom.text: Metrom is a flexible liquidity mining platform designed to help DEXes and projects efficiently launch and manage multiple incentivization campaigns. With a focus on security, ease of use and efficiency, Metrom enables projects to create campaigns quickly, with minimal leakage, while optimizing rewards for liquidity providers.

differences.title: How are we different from others?
differences.text1: Metrom's key differentiator is its {{boldText}}, which ensures that rewards are distributed based on TVL performance metrics that matter most to your liquidity needs. Unlike traditional farming, where rewards may be misallocated or diluted, Metrom’s KPI-driven approach focuses rewards on specific targets, optimizing the impact of each campaign.
differences.text2: Additionally, Metrom allows you to launch multiple campaigns with multiple rewards in a single transaction, saving time and reducing complexity. By using off-chain computations, it further enhances accuracy and frequency in reward distribution, significantly improving the overall experience for campaign creators and liquidity providers.

campaigns.title: How do I create a campaign?
campaigns.text1: Creating a campaign on Metrom is simple:
campaigns.text2: Select your DEX and liquidity pair.
campaigns.text3: Add your reward tokens and set your campaign duration.
campaigns.text4: Launch the campaign—all in under a minute.
campaigns.text5: For a more in-depth guide, you can watch the tutorial video or read our {{linkText}}.

tokens.title: How do I whitelist a reward token?
tokens.text1: You can whitelist a reward token by simply going to the Metrom's {{linkText}} and create a ticket by filling the form with the details.
tokens.text2: The process typically takes 24 to 48 hours, after which the token will be approved for campaigns.
tokens.text3: Alternatively, you can visit our Discord and open a support ticket in the 'help-zone' channel.

dexes.title: How can Metrom support your DEX?
dexes.text1: Metrom enhances your DEX by making campaign creation and management seamless and cost-effective. With our streamlined UI, you can easily launch multiple campaigns in a single transaction, reducing time and effort.
dexes.text2: Once your campaigns are live, Metrom's KPI-based and range-targeted incentives attract liquidity efficiently and help retain it over time, maximizing the overall impact of your campaigns.

about.title: About Metrom
about.metrom: Metrom is a programmable incentive platform that helps protocols design sustainable, KPI-based reward campaigns for liquidity providers. We're working with leading chains and DeFi protocols to reshape how token incentives are structured across the ecosystem.
